thread.section_title: Hotel Joke - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Super friendly, comfortable, good location
thread.title_full: Super friendly, comfortable, good location - Review of Hotel Joke - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: saba-95
title: Super friendly, comfortable, good location
text:
We stayed in Hotel Joke for 3 nights in March. The welcome could not have been more friendly. We were offered coffee the moment we walked through the door. We were also upgraded to superior room, which was a bonus. Room was clean and comfortable. Location is very good, just 200 m from Moulin Rouge and Blanche metro station. Monmartre on your doorstep.
All staff, incl kitchen staff and cleaners were super friendly and very genuine. They weren't just going through the motions, they were really keen to help. There is coffee and cake in the lobby all day and you can help yourself as much as you want. Brilliant after a day exploring. Will try to stay here again next time. Highly recommended.
Room Tip: Room on the back very quiet, even with window open. See more room tips
